notes: Wet outfield. Umpires decided that the mopping up operations would not have the outfield ready by 13:30 local time (which would allow 25 overs-a-side). Hence they have abandoned the match.

seriesStories.title: Singer Akai Nidahas Trophy, 1997-98
seriesStories.subTitle: Winner: India
seriesStories.summary: This tournament was staged in honour of the Golden Jubilee of Sri Lankan independence ( nidahas  in Sinhalese)
